title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Fry the bacon until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti with bacon and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in egg-cheese mixture and stir well.
Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery and creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Grill chicken until cooked.
Cook onions, garlic, and tomatoes in butter.
Add spices and cream to form a sauce.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Jollof Rice
summary: A popular West African rice dish cooked in a rich tomato sauce with spices.
instructions: Blend tomatoes, onions, and pepper into a paste.
Cook the paste in oil until thick.
Add spices and water, then bring to boil.
Add rice and cook until tender.
Serve with chicken or fish.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup, butter, and fresh fruits.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Add milk and eggs, then whisk until smooth.
Heat a pan and melt butter.
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with syrup.
